on reading compounds: 爻【コウ】yao (line representing yin or yang that comprises one third of a trigram)
爻辞【コウジ】commentary (on any of the 384 lines of the hexagrams in the Book of Changes)
陽爻【ヨウコウ】yang yao (unbroken line composing one third of a trigram)
陰爻【インコウ】yin yao (broken line composing one third of a trigram)
